title: How can technology improve the efficiency of a business? - B2B Market MENA Regions - Quora

response.answer_text: In two words, data and automation : Automation can help you with the repetitive and time-consuming tasks, helping businesses focus on the critical tasks instead of spending heaps of time producing reportingsFor example, using a chatbot to field low-level helpdesk questions, having the focus on trickier questionsData in itself is just info, but leveraging it using data analytics, or even data science in some cases, can help businesses gather insights and get a stronger understanding of their activity, their market, their clients, and anything else that generate data when manipulated. Leveraging data is a bit more longer game than automation, but can be invaluable in terms of improvements for a business.For example, as a store/supermarket, you could identify the periodicity of the sales of your products, to restock them only when they fly off the shelves. Pushing this example a step further, you could implement a model predicting your stock variations based on your stock history.

A2A How can technology improve the efficiency of a business? It can’t and never will. Technology can only support the efficacy of business. This definition problem has been created by the IT Industry. The IT industry has always created its own market either via incremental development or by being disruptive. Sell more by using system x Sounds familiar? Of course, technical innovation in all its form will always be important by improving your business using the right digital processes and creating the right sales processes. But when it comes to selling technology and how you want to reach your customer, yes digital processes and platforms will be important. But don’t get blinded by it. Ask yourself, how can I reach my business goals, solve my business needs or problems so that the right technology can support my business. Once sellers and buyers meet and start those questions, thats when business is made. · 1 Request
